name: Protector Force +
desc: For each ally within three spaces of the unit, this unit gains +2 to most stats. This unit heals 20% HP per ally within three spaces of the unit.
components: 2*len([unitx for unitx in game.get_all_units() if unitx.team in 'player other' and unitx.nid is not unit.nid and utils.calculate_distance(unit.position,unitx.position) <= 3])
